module.name: strategy/general/memo
module.description: The memo operator makes a strategy into a memoizing strategy that looks up the term to be transformed in a memo table and only computes the transformation if the term is not found.

strategy.name: memo
strategy.description: <memo(tbl, s)> t first looks up the term t in the memo table. If present the association in the table is produced, else the result of <s> t is computed and stored in the table.
